name: Silly Frog
description:
SILLY FROG

Join our lovably silly frog on an enchanting journey to win the heart of a beautiful swan. As a stranger to her world, our froggy friend must overcome numerous obstacles in the swan's introspective realm to get closer to her heart and understand her better.

FEATURES:

  • 50 handcrafted levels with challenges and surprises.
  • Vibrant colors and changing palettes for an immersive experience.
  • Soothing music enhances the adventure.
  • Humorous love story as the frog sets out to win the heart of the swan.

Discover the true essence of love
